img_above_text:
![Wukong Snowhill 4.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/a6/Wukong_Snowhill_4.jpg)
Be sure to look to the left as you head down from the ledge, and you'll find a small pool of water with some Jade Lotus, and another Monk Supporter guarding a**Small Chest** , likely containing some Cold Iron Leaves and other materials.
img_below_text:
Head upwards to a break in the cave as the snowy wind billows down, and prepare for the low visibility to mask another Cyan Bat hiding around the corner.
## Frost-Clad Path

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," where the player character is engaged in combat in a snowy environment. The preceding text mentions discovering a small pool of water with Jade Lotus and a Monk Supporter guarding a small chest, while the following text warns of low visibility and a hidden Cyan Bat. The image serves to illustrate the challenging and immersive gameplay in the Frost-Clad Path area, emphasizing exploration, combat, and environmental hazards.
